actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 319 - 9 (Record Vote No: 303).
Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from June 29 to July 23, 1984 and an adjournment of the Senate from June 29 or June 30 to July 23, 1984.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from June 29 until July 23, 1984, and of the Senate from June 29 or 30 until July 23, 1984.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from June 29 to July 23, 1984 and an adjournment of the Senate from June 29 or June 30 to July 23, 1984.
